Automation

Show Command sequence should follow order below :

cisco_ios : 1. show inventory, 2. show run, 3. show run, 4. show process cpu, 5. show process cpu, 6. show env, 7. show env, 8. show environment, 9. show environment all, 10. show log

cisco_xe : 1. show inventory, 2. show run, 3. show run, 4. show process cpu, 5. show process cpu, 6. show env, 7. show env, 8. show environment, 9. show environment all, 10. show log

cisco_asa : 1. show inventory, 2. show run, 3. show run, 4. show process cpu, 5. show process cpu, 6. show env, 7. show env, 8. show environment, 9. show environment all, 10. show log

cisco_nxos : 1. show inventory, 2. show run, 3. show run, 4. show process cpu, 5. show process cpu, 6. show env, 7. show env, 8. show environment, 9. show environment all, 10. show log
